member.name: WS_SUBJECT_NAME_CERT_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: The type for specifying a certificate credential using the certificate's subject name, store location and store name. The specified credential is loaded when the containing channel or listener is opened.

member.name: WS_SUBJECT_NAME_CERT_CREDENTIAL.credential
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other certificate credential types derive.

member.name: WS_SUBJECT_NAME_CERT_CREDENTIAL.storeLocation
member.summary: The certificate store location (such as CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_CURRENT_USER or CERT_SYSTEM_STORE_LOCAL_MACHINE) that contains the specified certificate.

member.name: WS_SUBJECT_NAME_CERT_CREDENTIAL.storeName
member.summary: The certificate store name (such as "My") that contains the specified certificate.

member.name: WS_SUBJECT_NAME_CERT_CREDENTIAL.subjectName
member.summary: The subject name (such as "CN=service.com") of the specified certificate. The supplied subject name string must be in a format acceptable to CERT_FIND_SUBJECT_NAME-based search. (See .)
